error_codes.summary_template: invalid_utf8: source file is not valid UTF-8
multiple_statements_one_line: only one item or statement per line
error_codes.primary_span_rule: start token of the second item/statement

error_codes.summary_template: chained_compare_forbidden: chained comparisons are not allowed
generic_args_require_turbofish: use `::<...>` for generics
array_type_semicolon_forbidden: use `[T, N]`
match_wildcard_must_be_last: `_` must be final arm
invalid_for_iterable: for-loop iterable not supported
unknown_field: no such field on type
opaque_type_use_forbidden: cannot construct/destructure opaque stdlib type
invalid_format_string: format string shape not supported
format_string_not_literal: fmt argument must be a string literal
nominal_type_not_alias: type is nominal, not interchangeable
duplicate_field: field listed more than once
reserved_name_redefinition: `{name}` is a reserved prelude/stdlib identifier
error_codes.primary_span_rule: the identifier token that introduces the forbidden binding

error_codes.summary_template: inherent_impl_forbidden_in_user_code: inherent impl blocks are stdlib-only
error_codes.primary_span_rule: the `impl` keyword of the inherent impl item

error_codes.summary_template: missing_effect: callee requires effect not declared by caller
await_outside_async: `.await` used outside `async fn`
effectful_closure_forbidden: closures must be pure in v0.2.1.1
unknown_or_invalid_effect: effect not in closed set or async mismatch
duplicate_effect: effect listed more than once
use_after_move: moved value used again
missing_capability_turbofish: mint requires `::<"...">`
capability_policy_not_literal: capability policy must be string literal
borrow_violation: violates &/&mut exclusivity
raw_access_forbidden: cannot access/destructure Raw<T>
overlapping_impl_forbidden: overlapping trait impls are not allowed
module_file_ambiguous: both file and dir module exist
module_file_missing: module path has no file
relative_use_forbidden: `use` must start with `crate::`
layer_violation: illegal import across layers
invalid_refinement_predicate: refinement predicate not in closed DSL
refinement_constructor_forbidden: use validate for non-literals
max_lines_exceeded
max_params_exceeded
max_nesting_exceeded
max_complexity_exceeded
must_handle_expression_statement: cannot ignore must-handle
must_handle_underscore_binding_forbidden
must_handle_bound_but_unused: must-handle value not consumed
formatter_not_idempotent: formatting is not idempotent
